dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: The Cora dataset is a citation network where nodes represent documents and edges represent citations. Each document is represented by a bag-of-words feature vector.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Zhilin Yang
William W Cohen
Ruslan Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: The Citeseer dataset is a citation network similar to Cora, where nodes represent documents and edges represent citations. Each document is represented by a bag-of-words feature vector.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: Marinka Zitnik
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: The Pubmed dataset is a citation network where nodes represent scientific articles and edges represent citations. Each article is represented by a bag-of-words feature vector.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:creator: Marinka Zitnik
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: The PPI dataset consists of protein-protein interaction networks, where nodes represent proteins and edges represent interactions. Each protein has multiple labels from various classes.
dcterms:title: PPI (Protein-Protein Interaction)
